data.title: 2025 NCT WISH ASIA TOUR LOG in MANILA
data.description:
The excitement is building for NCTzen WISH in the Philippines as the 2025 NCT WISH ASIA TOUR LOG in heads to Manila on April 12, 2025 at the New Frontier Theater. This special event marks the first time NCT WISH, will bring their captivating performance to the Philippines, and it promises to be a night to remember.

随着 2025 年 4 月 12 日在新前沿剧院举行的 2025 NCT WISH 亚洲巡回演唱会 LOG in 即将在马尼拉举行，NCTzen WISH 在菲律宾的演出越来越令人兴奋。这次特别活动标志着 NCT WISH 首次将他们迷人的表演带到菲律宾，这注定是一个难忘的夜晚。


NCT WISH is a six-member boy group under SM Entertainment and the sixth and final sub-unit of NCT. Consisting of members SION, YUSHI, JAEHEE, RYO, SAKUYA and RIKU, NCT WISH made their debut on February 21, 2024 through the SMTOWN Live 2024 : SMCU Palace@Tokyo, before releasing the single "WISH" on February 28.

NCT WISH 是 SM Entertainment 旗下的六人男子组合，也是 NCT 的第六个也是最后一个小分队。NCT WISH 由成员 SION、YUSHI、JAEHEE、RYO、SAKUYA 和 RIKU 组成，于 2024 年 2 月 21 日通过 SMTOWN Live 2024：SMCU Palace@Tokyo 首次亮相，并于 2 月 28 日发行单曲“WISH”。


NCT WISH released their first single album "WISH", which includes the title song "WISH" and the Korean and Japanese versions of the album "Sail Away".

NCT WISH发行首张单曲专辑《WISH》，收录主打歌《WISH》以及专辑《Sail Away》的韩文版和日文版。


On January 14, 2025, it was announced that NCT WISH will be releasing "Miracle", a remake of the 2005 SUPER JUNIOR song, as a pre-release for the SM Entertainment 30th anniversary album 2025 SMTOWN : The Culture, The Future.

2025 年 1 月 14 日，NCT WISH 宣布将发行 2005 年 SUPER JUNIOR 歌曲翻唱版“Miracle”，作为 SM Entertainment 30 周年专辑《2025 SMTOWN：文化，未来》的预发行。


In Manila, NCT WISH will take over the New Frontier Theater, providing an intimate setting for fans to experience the energy and excitement of live performances. this show is bound to be one of the most talked-about events in the Philippines.

在马尼拉，NCT WISH 将接管 New Frontier 剧院，为粉丝提供一个亲密的环境，让他们体验现场表演的活力和刺激。这场演出注定会成为菲律宾最受关注的活动之一。


Mark your calendars and grab your tickets for 2025 NCT WISH ASIA TOUR LOG in Manila on April 12, 2025. It’s going to be a night of dreams coming true, and you won’t want to miss it!

标记你的日历，并抓住机会购买2025年4月12日在马尼拉举行的NCT WISH亚洲巡回演唱会LOG的门票。这将是一个梦想成真的夜晚，你绝对不想错过！


Date & Time 時間: 2025/04/12 (SAT) 6:00PM

（實際演出時間以現場狀況為準Actual performance time based on on-site situation）

Venue 地點: New Frontier Theater General Roxas Avenue, Cubao Quezon City, Philippines


General Sale 公開售票

2025/03/05 (WED) 10:00 Local time



Ticket Price 門票價格

-SVIP SEATED PHP 11,500 (HKD$ 1559)

-PLATINUM STANDING PHP 8,500 (HKD$ 1159)

-LOGE PHP 9,500 (HKD$ 1289)

-BALCONY PHP 5,500 (HKD$ 759)





*Must complete ticketing website member registration before proceeding any ticket purchase.

無論是會員預售還是公開發售，都請記得預先登記成為各票務網站會員才可購票

*Purchase limit is 4 tickets per show per transaction for general sale.

公開售票每人每交易限購四張票券。

*If a ticket is lost, damaged, defaced or stolen, the organizer and ticketing agency will not reissue or replace the ticket, and will not bear any responsibility. Please keep your ticket carefully.

演出門票如有遺失、損毀、塗污或被竊，主辦及售票機構概不補發或更換門票，亦不會承擔任何責任，敬請小心保管。

*FANTOPIA serves as an electronic voucher, which needs to be exchanged for a physical ticket on-site on the day of the performance.

FANTOPIA為電子憑證，需演出日當天現場兌換紙票。

*We do not offer returns or exchanges

售出門票不設退換

eventsEntity.entityAdress: RM 413,4/F LUCKY CTR 165-171WAN CHAI RD WAN CHAI HK
